content:
The Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada Ruslan Stefanchuk, within the framework of his working visit to Austria, met with the head of the National Assembly of Bulgaria by Russia Zhelazkov.

About this hereportedFacebook.

“Particular attention was paid to the defense sphere. He focused that the acceleration of our victory is possible only if the weapons, in particular, artillery, ammunition, anti -air defense systems and the necessary staffing, ”he wrote.

In addition, Ruslan Stefanchuk added that Ukraine needs help in the treatment of wounded Ukrainian servicemen.

"The focus is on Ukraine's European and Euro-Atlantic integration. He emphasized that Ukraine has fulfilled all four legislative steps - a condition for the start of negotiations on joining the European Union," the statement reads.

The Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada also stressed that Ukraine needs effective security guarantees.

As reported by the Armyinform, BulgariaSendedHundreds of armored personnel carriers in Ukraine.
title: The VRU Chairman discussed with the head of the Bulgaria National Assembly supply and treatment of wounded military
description: He announced this on Facebook.    "Particular attention was paid to the defense sector....
author: Army Inform
